text:
@PressSec @realDonaldTrump Raise your hand if you’re one of the 4.8 million ppl in the US who got a brand new job.

Going back to your old job doesn’t count. 

Like = new job
Retweet = old job / unemployed 

Let’s see how this goes

#coronavirus #TrumpKnewAndDidNothing #GhislaineMaxwell  #JobsReport
